GSD.product_version: versions from v5.2 to before v5.4.230
GSD.description:
misc: fastrpc: Don't remove map on creater_process and device_release

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.230 by commit 4b5c44e924a571d0ad07054de549624fbc04e4d7, it was introduced in version v5.2 by commit b49f6d83e290f17e20f4e5cf31288d3bb4955ea6. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: misc: fastrpc: Don't remove map on creater_process and device_release
